p: As part of the AEAP, lakes were sampled three times during the summer (July, Aug, September) from 1994â€“1996. Starting in 1997, lakes were sampled twice per year (July and August). The ALTM program collected water chemistry data monthly, 12 months of the year starting in 1992 and is an on-going monitoring program ( http://www.adirondacklakessurvey.org/). For the purposes of this paper the ALTM monthly chemistry data range from January 1994 to December 2012.
